tuv.seg: *there is no result in brew or brew cask*.
*在brew或brew cask中沒有結果*.
According to a survey in 2010[2] among 458 professional translators, OmegaT is used 1/3 as much as Wordfast, Déjà Vu and MemoQ, and 1/8 as much as the market leader Trados.
在2010年对458名专业译员的调查[2]表明，OmegaT的用户数达到Wordfast、DejaVu和MemoQ的1/3，且达到了市场领导者塔多思的1/8。
For glossaries, OmegaT mainly uses tab-delimited plain text files in UTF-8 encoding with the .txt extension.
对于术语库，OmegaT主要使用tab分隔的UTF-8编码且扩展名为.txt的纯文本文件。
It could translate unformatted text files, and HTML, and perform only block-level segmentation (i.e. paragraphs instead of sentences).
它可以翻譯無格式文本文檔和HTML, 並且只處理區塊水平的文段(即段落替代句子).
It is available in 27 languages.
它的界面和文档被翻译成27种语言。
It subsequently saves that database to disk in Translation Memory eXchange (.tmx) format for use another day, in other projects, by other translators, and even with other CAT tools.
它隨後以翻譯記憶交換文件(.tmx)格式存在硬盤中，以便在以后翻译时重用或者和其他使用OmegaT或其他CAT工具的译员进行交换。
It was originally written in C++.
最初是用C++編寫的.

Its features include customisable segmentation using regular expressions, translation memory with fuzzy matching and match propagation, glossary matching, dictionary matching, translation memory and reference material searching, and inline spell-checking using Hunspell spelling dictionaries.
它的功能包括使用正则表达式的可自定义分段，带有模糊匹配和匹配传播的翻譯記憶，术语库匹配，词典匹配和参考资料搜索以及使用Hunspell拼写词典的内联拼写检查功能。
No change, naturally enough, means no such update.
沒有改變，自然就夠了，意味著沒有這樣的升級。
OmegaT handles a translation job as a project, a hierarchy of folders with specific names.
OmegaT將每個翻譯工作作為一個項目，具有特定名稱的文件夾層次結構。
OmegaT is intended for professional translators.
OmegaT适用于专业译员。
OmegaT runs on Linux, Mac OS X and Microsoft Windows 98 SE or higher,[1] and requires Java 1.5.
OmegaT可运行于Linux、Mac OS X和Microsoft Windows 98 SE或更高版本，[1]并且需要Java 1.5。
OmegaT was first developed by Keith Godfrey in 2000.
OmegaT是Keith Godfrey在2000年首先開發的.
OmegaT, when directed, generates the (partially) translated versions in the /target/ subfolder.
而在翻译结束后，已翻译的文档会出现在/target/子文件夹中。

Other named folders include ones for automatic consultation within the program: /tm/ for existing translation pairs in .tmx format, /tm/auto/ for automatic translation of 100% matches, /glossary/ for glossaries, /dictionary/ for StarDict (and .tbx) dictionaries.
在开始翻译前，用户还可以复制以前的翻译记忆到/tm/子文件夹，复制术语库到/glossary/文件夹以及复制StarDict词典到/dictionary/文件夹，在翻译时OmegaT会自动查阅它们。
Similarly structured files in standard CSV format are also supported, as well as TBX files.
还支持使用标准CSV格式的类似结构的文件，对于TBX文件同样如此。
Such glossaries can easily be created in a text editor.
文本编辑器中可以很容易创建这样的术语库。
The Editor pane displays the source documents as individual “segments” for translation one segment at at time.
編輯窗口將源文件顯示為獨立的片段以便於一次翻譯一個片段.
The first public release in February 2001[3] was written in Java.
2001年2月首次公開發布的版本[3]使用Java編寫.
The optional Machine Translation pane shows machine translations from Google Translate and similar services.
如果啟用了機器翻譯，相應的窗口會顯示由Google翻譯或其他類似服務所產生的譯文。

The structure of a glossary file is extremely simple: the first column contains the source language word, the second column contains the corresponding target language words, the third column (optional) can contain anything including comments on context etc.
术语库文件的结构非常简单：首列包含源语言词语，第二列包含对应的目标语言词语，第三列（可省略）与词语相关的上下文注释等。
This version used a proprietary translation memory format.
這個版本採用了用戶翻譯記憶格式.

When the user goes to translate a segment in the Editor pane, OmegaT automatically searches the .tmx files in the /tm/ hierarchy for previous translation pairs with similar source sentences and displays them in the Fuzzy Matches pane for insertion into the Editor pane with a keyboard shortcut.

When the user goes to translate a segment in the Editor pane, OmegaT automatically searches the .tmx files in the /tm/ hierarchy for previous translation pairs with similar source sentences and displays them in the Fuzzy Matches pane for insertion into the Editor pane with a keyboard shortcut.进行翻译时，OmegaT会自动检查以前的翻译以寻找类似的句子，找到后会显示在模糊匹配窗格中。
When the user leaves a segment, OmegaT normally first adds the source-target pair to its database in memory.
當用戶完成翻譯並離開某一部分時，OmegaT首先會在記憶庫中的數據庫裡添加一對源文件--目的文件對。
